comments.comment: Dan vade kalane hamuduruwane. .eelangata mulu rattama eka neethyak gana katha karamu. Muslim neeyhiya, thesawalame neethiya, udarata neeyhiya,pahatharata neethiy,roma landesy neethya. Ewa me raten athugala ekma eka neethyakata yamu. Eka singhalayatath damilayatath muslimanuwatath ekakak viya yuthui. Agam walata ihalin neethiya criyataka viya yuthui. Theruwan saranay.
comments.author: emmanuel silva

comments.comment:
GARU KATAYUTHU HAAMUDURUWANE, OBAWAHANSEE KIYANA DEWAL SERAMA ATHTHA.!!! MEDA PAARA APE SINHALA SHODARA SAHODARAYAN SAHA SAHODARIYAN OBAWAHANSEGE KATHA WALATA SAWAN DEE ETHAAMATH UTKARSHA ANDAMATA APE RATA NOBEDANA JADAIPATHI WARAYEKU PATH KARAGATHTHA.!!
OBWAHANSEE, SIYALU BAUDDHA BIKHSHUNWAHANSELA ME RATA WENUWEN KARANA SEWAYA ITAAMA ANARGAI.!!!! APE RATATA SAHA SIYALU RATA WASIYANTA SAMMA SAMBUDU SARANAI, THERUWAN PIHITAI.!!
comments.author: KENSHIRO
